ComicInfo.Summary:
Honey, I Shrunk the Hulk: Doc Samson and the Ringmaster help Banner merge all of his personalities into one being. The new Hulk is born, with jade giant strength and Bruce Banner's smarts.
The She-Hulk Lives: Bruce Banner visits his cousin Jennifer Walters, a lawyer who is defending a gangster against Nick Trask and his gang. When Jennifer is gunned down, Banner gives her a blood transfusion which accidentally turns her into She-Hulk.
The More Things Change...: With the Hulk and Banner merged once again, he is restrained at Gamma Base as he continues to switch from one to the other. Banner tries to emerge from the Hulk's chest and kill himself while the jade giant is forced to protect him. The Hulk escapes from his restraints and is chased toward Samson's nutrient bath. Ross tries to monkey with the equipment being used to cure Banner of the Hulk and, when Rick intervenes, Ross knocks him into the bath. The Hulk is submerged in the same tank and busts out of the side as the grey version of the Hulk but he quickly reverts to Banner.
ComicInfo.Writer: Peter David,Stan Lee,Al Milgrom,Peter David,Stan Lee,Al Milgrom
ComicInfo.Title: Honey, I Shrunk the Hulk; The She-Hulk Lives; The More Things Change...
